I've tried to install it on my VM ware Workstation 8 but unfortunately without success. It load the windows files and after the window for choosing OP it display error message. Any help will be appreciated.

I burned it on a DVD but it's not properly working install. When the installation windows appear: Select the OP System you want to install, the field to choose is empty and after that when the button Next is clicked, than you got the following error message: Windows could not display the images available for the installation, and it restarts again.
 To not download because it's a broken installation!
Don't be put off by the above negative comment. I successfully installed this release as standalone OS. It's working OK. For years I'm using BIE quality releases without a problem.
